thread.title: Gossip & Rumours: Chelsea eye Sergio Aguero transfer swoop as doubts over his Manchester City future grow
thread.title_full: Gossip & Rumours: Chelsea eye Sergio Aguero transfer swoop as doubts over his Manchester City future grow

title: Gossip & Rumours: Chelsea eye Sergio Aguero transfer swoop as doubts over his Manchester City future grow
text:
By Mirror Sunday, February 5th 2017 at 13:09 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Chelsea are planning to hijack Real Madrid’s £75million summer swoop for Sergio Aguero, with the Argentinian star not prepared to be a second-choice striker at Manchester City. 
European champions Real have held a long-term interest in Aguero and are on red alert now the explosive arrival of 19-year-old Brazilian Gabriel Jesus has clouded the Argentinian’s future. 
But Chelsea would also be major bidders if Aguero decides his career at the Etihad has run its course next summer. 
Manager Antonio Conte and his runaway Premier League leaders are still unclear whether 28-year-old top scorer Diego Costa sees his future at Stamford Bridge. 
Spain international Costa was recently reported to have been involved in a training ground bust-up and the West Londoners are exploring their attacking options for next season - with Aguero on their radar. 
Aguero fears the arrival of Brazilian wonderkid Jesus has dented his status as City’s number one striker.
